ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He has counted them and numbered them precisely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He has counted them and calculated their number.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily He encompasses them and has counted them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He has counted and enumerated them one by one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He knows their number and has counted each one of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, He knows each one of them, and has counted them a full counting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Certainly He has a comprehensive knowledge of them and He has numbered them a (comprehensive) numbering.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He has indeed counted them, and He has numbered them exactly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Verily He knoweth them and numbereth them with (right) numbering.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He has counted them and numbered them precisely,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Assuredly He hath comprehanded them and counted them a full Counting. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly He has counted them [all] and numbered them precisely,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He does take an account of them (all), and hath numbered them (all) exactly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, He knows each one of them, and has counted them a full counting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He has counted them and exactly numbered all;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He has enumerated them, and counted them one by one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He has enumerated them and counted them a [full] counting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:94] Verily He knows their number and has counted them precisely, and therefore [the knowledge of] their total number does not elude Him, not even [the knowledge] of one of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Verily He knoweth them) He remembers them (and numbereth them with (right) numbering) and He knows their number.
